metadata_description: Reaper is a proof-of-concept designed to exploit BYOVD (Bring Your Own Vulnerable Driver) driver vulnerability. This malicious technique involves inserting a legitimate - vulnerable driver into a target system - which allows attackers to exploit the driver to perform malicious actions.
